CustomField.formula: IF(Country != "Sweden",HYPERLINK("lightning/r/Report/00O4I000004WD2aUAG/view?queryScope=userFolders&" + CASE(Text(Business_Unit__c), "Apps", "fv1=", "Advisory","fv2=","DPS","fv3=","Business Development","fv4=","") + FirstName + " " + LastName, "Report " + "(" + TEXT(Business_Unit__c) + ")"),"#N/A")
CustomField.label: Opportunity BU Owner
